message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1500000 to me. I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset to you, and I'm willing to let it go for $1750000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire a potentially valuable asset at a price that reflects its inherent worth. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
